nodes.text: The inquisition module was a Mission Function Module designed to be used with the modular taskforce cruiser. It was deployed to planets to quell insurgencies and rebellions. It carried a hundred members of the Inquisitorius, 3,660 CompForce Observers, and 10,000 interrogation droids. It could deploy two IM-455 modular garrisons, and was stocked with 15,000 pre-fabricated disintegration chambers, an Orbital Data Net Eraser, sterilization spore probes, five cluster bombs with magnepulse bombs, and an orbital nightcloak. The entire module cost 425,000 credits.
